profile.name: Danny Vaca
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & Solutions Architect
profile.subtitle: Building scalable solutions with modern technologies
profile.description:
Senior Full Stack Developer with almost 15 years of experience implementing solutions for digital transformation in the cloud (Azure, AWS), developing cross-platform mobile applications (Flutter, React Native, Cordova) as well as deploying web applications based on microservices (Java, .Net, Python)
I have a wide range of certifications in Cloudera, Kubernetes, Azure, Terraform, Java, Python, UiPath that guarantee my knowledge
My previous experience allows me to understand and anticipate challenges, as well as propose solutions that add value to the business and ensure return on investment.

openSource.title: Open Source Libraries
openSource.subtitle: Contributing to the developer community with reusable solutions

libraries.jmixclientv1: Library to connect with jmix v1.x rest api
libraries.hotreloader: Re-executes a command when a file changes on specific folder
libraries.levenshtein: Computes levenshtein distance to find matches between strings
libraries.azureservicesclient: Library to connect and get metadata from Azure resources like synapse, storage accounts, etc
libraries.jmixclientv2: Library to connect with jmix v2.x rest api
libraries.fakeHttpServer: Fake http server which returns the hostname of the running machine and the node name shared via environment variables
libraries.sqlserver: Create sqlserver container with a database just passing the database name as parameter without the need of any external script
libraries.ansible: Docker image with ansible pre-installed for ci purposes
libraries.terraformAzure: Docker image with azure cli pre-installed for ci purposes
libraries.shiftRegister: Library to convert decimal numbers to binary and write out over shift registers
libraries.codeMetadata: Computes the metadata of the projects: files by extension, lines by extension, average lines per file
libraries.portCom: Library to read and plot data from serial port using Matlab
